title: CBC Hot Type Evan Solomon interviews Noam Chomsky on his book 9/11
description:
Transcript: 

Evan Solomon talks with Noam Chomsky about his book Hegemony or Survival: Americas Quest for Global Dominance. The show is Hot Type on CBC. Here is a more recent talk by Chomsky (.

An exclusive unedited interview from 2009 with the late ette McKinlay as she recounts how the events of 9/11, as well as the subsequent Anthrax attacks, .
